front.title: •We're The Bait
front.gametext: Deploy on Han, Leia or Chewie if captured or 'frozen.' Target Luke. Luke may not attempt Jedi Tests. Also, during each of opponent's draw phases, opponent loses 2 Force (3 if captive is 'frozen'). Utinni Effect canceled when reached by target. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'He doesn't want you at all, he's after somebody called, uh...Skywalker.' 'Luke?' 'Lord Vader has set a trap for him.' 'And we're that bait!' 'Yeah, well, he's on his way.'
